Sentencas: This paper deals with the development and potential application of a novel mixed ionic-electronic conducive anode composite comprised of copper and iron oxide based on gadolinium-doped ceria (CuO-Fe2O3/GDC) for solid-oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of nanocrystalline CuO-Fe2O3 /GDC anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Synthesis of the nanocrystalline CuO-Fe2O3/GDC powders was carried out using a novel co-precipitation method based on ammonium tartrate as the precipitant in a mixed-cationic solution composed of Cu2+, Fe3+, Gd3+, and Ce3+.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of nanocrystalline CuO-Fe2O3 /GDC anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thermal decomposition of the resultant precipitate after drying (at 55 degrees C) was investigated in a wide range of temperature (25-900 degrees C) using simultaneous DSC/TGA technique in air.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of nanocrystalline CuO-Fe2O3 /GDC anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The DSC/TGA results suggested the optimal calcination temperature of 500 degrees C for obtaining the nanocrystalline anode composite from the resultant precipitate.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of nanocrystalline CuO-Fe2O3 /GDC anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The synthesised CuO-Fe2O3/GDC samples were further characterised using XRD, dilatometry, FESEM, and EDX.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of nanocrystalline CuO-Fe2O3 /GDC anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Several single cells of SOFCs were fabricated in the anode-supported geometry using the synthesised CuO-Fe2O3/GDC composite as the anode, GDC/CuO composite as the electrolyte, and LSCF/GDC composite as the cathode layer.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of nanocrystalline CuO-Fe2O3 /GDC anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The fabricated cells were analysed using FESEM imaging and EIS analysis, where an equivalent circuit containing five R-CPE terms was used to interpret the EIS data.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of nanocrystalline CuO-Fe2O3 /GDC anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The module fitted well the impedance data and allowed for a detailed deconvolution of the total impedance spectra.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of nanocrystalline CuO-Fe2O3 /GDC anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The catalytic activity and uniformity of the synthesised nanocomposites was further evaluated using TPR analysis, demonstrating excellent activity at temperatures as low as 200 degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of nanocrystalline CuO-Fe2O3 /GDC anode powders for solid oxide fuel cells
